label: 代々長者舎利勘記
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: だいだいちょうじゃしゃりかんき
見出し読み_mod: だいだいちょうじゃしゃりかんき
説明文: Work recounting each of the relic inventories performed by the Tōji abbots in the Shingon chapel or some other area of the palace grounds from 950 to 1146, inserted in the relics chapter of Kakuzen shō.
